titles.title: HP368 Lord you give to us

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, you give to us
The precious gift of life,
A stewardship for every husband, every wife.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, you give to us
Not only flesh and blood,
But mind and heart and soul to know that they are good.

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines:
Lord, you ask of us
A death to what we knew,
Then, rising in your name, we'll put our trust in you.

verse.name: v6
